slide.title: Sponsors
slide.blurb: Because there is no one single company driving the development of PHP, we are enormously indebted to a number of fine organizations that sponsor various aspects of the community:

list.bullet: Developers: all the employers of all the people who contribute work to PHP
Mirror sites: the 96 companies providing mirrors across the world

Development machines: pair Networks (CVS server and mailing lists), VA Software (primary rsync server, documentation build machine), Synacor (www.php.net and other web servers), Rackshack (new www.php.net)
